scripts.start:local: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail 'npm run types:watch' 'vite dev --mode local-env --config ./vite.config.ts' --names 'tsc-lib,playground' -c blue,green,cyan,yellow
scripts.start:loop: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail 'npm run types:watch' 'vite dev --mode loop --config ./vite.config.ts' --names 'tsc-lib,playground' -c blue,green,cyan,yellow
scripts.start:test: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail 'npm run types:watch' 'vite dev --mode development --config ./vite.config.ts' --names 'tsc-lib,playground' -c blue,green,cyan,yellow
scripts.start:beta: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail 'npm run types:watch' 'vite dev --mode beta --config ./vite.config.ts' --names 'tsc-lib,playground' -c blue,green,cyan,yellow
scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && vite build --mode esm --config vite.config.ts && vite build --mode cjs --config vite.config.ts && tsc --project tsconfig-build.json
scripts.demo: npm run build:demo && vite preview --mode demo --config ./vite.config.ts
scripts.start:mocked: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail 'npm run types:watch' 'vite dev --mode mocked --config ./vite.config.ts' --names 'lib-types,playground' -c blue,green,cyan,yellow
scripts.start:mock:e2e: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail 'npm run types:watch' 'cross-env E2E_TEST=true vite dev --mode mocked --config ./vite.config.ts' --names 'lib-types,playground' -c blue,green,cyan,yellow
scripts.format:all: prettier --write 'src/**/*.{ts,js,css, scss, html}' && prettier --write 'src/**/*.{ts,js,css, scss, html}'
